attributes.action: Prevent local councils from introducing "pay as you throw" unfairly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We already pay the council tax for a refuse service, and we already pay for the packaging when we buy the goods that come with it. Should we now pay even more?
Please prevent the councils from introducing this nonsense or ask them to remove the refuse collection element of the council Tax bill.

rejection.details: The government cannot act on hypothetical situations.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
